snippet.title: Freeky Faucets Arcade | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Freeky Faucets is a bug-sized rougelike adventure of boogas versus faucets!

RELEASES DECEMBER 25TH

WISHLIST ON STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3348710/Freeky_Faucets_Arcade/?beta=0

itch.io (purchase comes with Steam key):
https://the-bughouse.itch.io/freeky-faucets-arcade

In Freeky Faucets, you play as these round beetle bugs called Boogas. The Faucets have invaded ally grounds! Each run, choose between six different boogas with unique abilities, acquire powerful items from Faucet Friend and company, and destroy every last faucet foe as your power grows. Outlast the faucet invasion across each sector and recover your lost territory!

Game developed by Emma Chattybird
Original Soundtrack by Stashclub

Follow us!
https://linktr.ee/the_bughouse

#indiegame #trailer #rougelike #videogames #gametrailer #indiegames #trailers #videogame #gametrailers
